seed pls =)
Ah! that's what I was waiting since past month. Great print. even greater than S4A's. (In size as well) LOL

This encoding is flawed.

For some reason, the last third of the film (say around the 1:20 mark is jittery, choppy and hard to watch.  It's bareable, but just.

At first I thought it was intentional, given the scene -- but it continues until the end of the film, in scenes that don't warrant it, and appears to be worse in scenes with a lot of detail and motion.

V5
A8
You will see no more imaginative film this year than Life of Pi, whose conceit of a young Indian boy stranded with a Bengal Tiger in a lifeboat amid the Pacific Ocean is fantastical yet real in its metaphoric implications. Quality sucked but you can find a HD one at lifeofpi.blackpathway.com which worked great for me. While the framing device of a story told to a stranger uses the old flashback, the lonely lifeboat is as new as any story told in the last century.
I heard that this movie is one of the best so i was searching for better quality and i found it at https://crsh.me/bluray and i enjoyed watching it :)
